Name: Cisco UCS SDU Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the SDU messages for Cisco UCS servers implementations.

InternalError.Description: Indicates that the request failed for an unknown internal error.
InternalError.Message: The request failed due to an internal service error.
InternalError.Resolution: Reboot the BMC and retrigger the diagnostics. If the problem persists, contact Cisco TAC for additional support.

HostNotReachable.Description: Indicates that the request failed because unable to communicate with the host.
HostNotReachable.Message: The request failed due to communication issue with the host.
HostNotReachable.Resolution: Make sure diagnostic ISO is booted. Else try again after booting diagnostic ISO.
